7 class Joy_teleop
8 {
9 public:
10  Joy_teleop();
11  int lin_inc = 5;
12  int ang_inc = 5;
13 
14 private:
15  void joyCallback(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr &joy);
16  void toggleJoyCallback(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr &msg);
17 
18  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
19  int toggle_joy_flag_ = -1;
20  int linear_, angular_;
21  int l_inc_, a_inc_, l_dec_, a_dec_;
22  ros::Publisher vel_pub_;
23  ros::Subscriber joy_sub_;
24  ros::Subscriber toggle_joy_sub_;
25 
26  ros::Publisher vel_gui_pub_;
27  my_actuator::ang_lin_arr gui_vel;

30 Joy_teleop::Joy_teleop() : linear_(3),
31  angular_(0),
32  l_inc_(3),
33  a_inc_(0),
34  l_dec_(1),
35  a_dec_(2)
36 {
37 
38  nh_.param("axis_linear", linear_, linear_);
39  nh_.param("axis_angular", angular_, angular_);
40  // nh_.param("scale_angular", a_scale_, a_scale_);
41  // nh_.param("scale_linear", l_scale_, l_scale_);
42 
43  vel_pub_ = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("skid_steer/cmd_vel", 1);
44 
45  joy_sub_ = nh_.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Joy>("/joy", 10, &Joy_teleop::joyCallback, this);
46  toggle_joy_sub_ = nh_.subscribe<std_msgs::Bool>("/toggle_joy", 50, &Joy_teleop::toggleJoyCallback, this);
47  vel_gui_pub_ = nh_.advertise<my_actuator::ang_lin_arr>("/vel_status", 1);
48  ROS_WARN("teleop_joy NODE STARTED!!!");
49 }
50 
51 void Joy_teleop::toggleJoyCallback(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr &msg)
52 {
53 
54  toggle_joy_flag_ = msg->data;
55 }
56 
57 void Joy_teleop::joyCallback(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr &joy)
58 {
59  // ROS_INFO("toggle: %d craweler", toggle_joy_flag_);
60 
61  if (toggle_joy_flag_ == 0)
62  {
63  // ROS_INFO("inside: %d craweler", toggle_joy_flag_);
64 
65  geometry_msgs::Twist twist;
66  lin_inc = lin_inc + 1 * joy->buttons[l_inc_];
67  ang_inc = ang_inc + 2 * joy->buttons[a_inc_];
68 
69  lin_inc = lin_inc - 1 * joy->buttons[l_dec_];
70  ang_inc = ang_inc - 2 * joy->buttons[a_dec_];
71 
72  if (lin_inc <= 0)
73  {
74  lin_inc = 0;
75  }
76 
77  if (ang_inc <= 0)
78  {
79  ang_inc = 0;
80  }
81 
82  if (lin_inc >= 28)
83  {
84  lin_inc = 28;
85  }
86 
87  if (ang_inc >= 15)
88  {
89  ang_inc = 15;
90  }
91 
92  if (joy->buttons[l_inc_] || joy->buttons[a_inc_] || joy->buttons[l_dec_] || joy->buttons[a_dec_])
93  {
94  ROS_INFO("linear: %d , angular: %d", lin_inc, ang_inc);
95  }
96  twist.angular.z = ang_inc * joy->axes[angular_];
97  twist.linear.x = lin_inc * joy->axes[linear_];
98 
99  gui_vel.data[0] = twist.linear.x;
100  gui_vel.data[1] = twist.angular.z;
101  gui_vel.data[2] = lin_inc;
102  gui_vel.data[3] = ang_inc;
103  vel_gui_pub_.publish(gui_vel);
104 
105  vel_pub_.publish(twist);
106  }
107 }
108 
109 int main(int argc, char **argv)
110 {
111  ros::init(argc, argv, "teleop_joy");
112  Joy_teleop teleop_skidsteer;
113 
114  ros::spin();
115 }
